text: Anybody else seeing a permissions error when trying pull down the @HubSpot/growth theme?

Is there a way to include child css or js files without having to clone the `base.html` template? It would be nice to have something like these additional options in the `theme.json` file:
```child-css-assets: [
  'path/to/child.css'
], 
child-js-assets: [
  'path/to/child.js'
]```
